launch_GUI module

Shape Memory Alloy Rendering of Experimental Analysis and Calibration Tool (SMA-REACT)

Main launch script

Last updated: August 30th, 2024 (see GitHub for updates)

class launch_GUI.App[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

Master GUI with all required tabs (implemented as different classes). Inherits the QtWidgets.QMainWindow class.

change_tabs(index)[source]

Enables the specified tab and changes to that tab. To connect this to a pushButton or another widget, you must use a lambda function, like so:

widget.clicked.connect(
lambdaself.changeTabs(

index = some_index )

)

Parameters:

index (INT) – Tab index that you would like to change to.

Return type:

None.

export_solution()[source]

Prints and exports the calibrated solution, with all of the important intermediary data.

Return type:

None.

run_calibration()[source]

Runs the calibration optimization and changes to the progress plotting tab.

#FIXME To-do: Include an export function here to make an Abaqus material model or export all required properties as a JSON or something similar.

Return type:

None.
